title: Constructivist-Based Online Psychology Project Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core psychological theories and practical experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Current elementary teachers conduct psychology-based problem-solving projects applicable to real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply psychology theories to real-world educational cases using self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can design and implement collaborative problem-solving projects based on constructivist principles
Learners can analyze project outcomes and suggest improvements through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
